description: User Onboarding Implementation - 6-step interactive tour using React Joyride to guide new users through core features in 60-90 seconds

userStories.title: Add Tour Targets to UI
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to add data-tour attributes to key UI elements so that the onboarding tour can highlight them during the walkthrough.
acceptanceCriteria: All 6 tour targets have data-tour attributes: training-card, rating-buttons, card-toolbar, sidebar-toggle, search-button, settings-button
Attributes are on stable elements (not conditionally rendered)
No duplicate IDs or conflicting selectors
Verify attributes in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP
Screenshot showing data attributes in DevTools inspector
Typecheck passes: npx tsc --noEmit

userStories.title: Implement Joyride Tour Flow
userStories.description: As a new user, I want an interactive 6-step onboarding tour so that I can learn the app's core features (cards, reveal, rating, audio/translation, sidebar, search/settings) in 60-90 seconds.
acceptanceCriteria: React Joyride installed (check package.json)
6 steps defined with correct targets and Dutch copy (Welcome, Reveal Card, Rate Knowledge, Audio & Translation, Recent & Details, Search & Settings)
Welcome step appears as center modal with title 'Welkom bij 2000NL'
Tour highlights correct elements in sequence using data-tour selectors
Start button begins tour, Overslaan button skips entire tour
Skip button available on all steps
Progress indicator shows (e.g., 2/6)
Completing tour sets onboarding_completed localStorage flag
Skipping tour also sets localStorage flag
Tour doesn't show on subsequent visits (checks localStorage)
Works on both mobile (375px) and desktop (1280px+) viewports
Spotlight overlay doesn't block card interactions
Screenshots of all 6 steps (mobile and desktop)
Typecheck passes: npx tsc --noEmit
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP

userStories.title: Settings Reset Tutorial Option
userStories.description: As a user, I want a 'Reset Tutorial' button in Settings so that I can replay the onboarding tour if I skipped it or need a refresher.
acceptanceCriteria: Reset Tutorial button appears in Settings modal
Button is clearly labeled and discoverable
Clicking button removes onboarding_completed localStorage key
User feedback shown (toast or alert) confirming reset
After reset, refreshing page triggers tour again
Button works on both mobile and desktop
Screenshot showing settings button placement
Typecheck passes: npx tsc --noEmit
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP

userStories.title: Polish and QA
userStories.description: As a user, I want the onboarding tour to be polished, mobile-friendly, and handle edge cases gracefully so that it feels helpful and professional.
acceptanceCriteria: All mobile tests pass (375px viewport): tooltips don't overflow, text readable, spotlight correct, touch works, sidebar toggle shows mobile version
All desktop tests pass (1280px viewport): positioning correct, keyboard navigation works, sidebar shows appropriate target
Edge cases handled: missing targets skip gracefully, clicks outside don't break tour, localStorage works across tabs
Copy is clear, concise, and typo-free (max 2 sentences per step)
Visual polish complete: spotlight opacity appropriate, tooltips match theme, animations smooth
Tour feels helpful (not annoying or overwhelming)
Skip button always accessible
localStorage behavior verified (persists correctly)
Screenshots document final tour flow (mobile + desktop)
No console errors during tour
Tour doesn't interfere with normal app usage
Typecheck passes: npx tsc --noEmit
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP
